verbs.description: [ARG0: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo] [V: says] [ARG1: the U.S. is aware of the risks of the upcoming summit between President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .
Secretary of State Mike Pompeo says [ARG1: the U.S.] [V: is] [ARG2: aware of the risks of the upcoming summit between President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .
